title: Champion Select Lobby Message Alerts
body:
I was just wondering, since I was just in a soloqueue game which somebody left, forgot to change their summoners.
We ended up losing, but whatever , it was just one game 14 points-ish

So I was thinking that Chat rooms in the League of Legends Chat service make noises and alerts , maybe the 
Champion selection lobby should have an alert noise too? So we can remind our teammates to not forget something crucial.

replies.body: Hmm, that's interesting. Do you mean something like a non-jarring "nudge" ping?
yeah , like a *thoomp* you hear in messenges
I have to say that is a good idea. Lots of people who have one of the first 2 picks go afk after their pick to get a drink or something.
